* dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lrt to LIBS for clock_gettime()

=== Patch ===
<pre>
--- orig/ureadahead-0.100.0/configure.ac	2009-11-29 07:57:20.000000000 -0700

+dnl When linking with --as-needed, add -lrt to LIBS for clock_gettime()
